Title: The Assassination of Amber Kearnen
Description:
I'm sorry to ask you to do this $n, but Amber Kearnen needs to die.

She is--or was--a member of SI:7. Her death was critical to uncovering that Matthias Shaw was replaced by a dreadlord during the Legion's invasion.

Unfortunately, her assassin hasn't shown up. I... need you to go to Dalaran and ensure she dies. And you can't tell her why.

We'll send you in disguised. No one can know you were there.
